books.author: by Catherine Coulter
books.description: Two cases — one concerning an attempted poisoning in Washington and another about the hunt for a serial killer in Los Angeles — are the focus of Coulter’s 20th F.B.I. thriller.
books.name: INSIDIOUS

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: A teenage girl heads north on the network that helped slaves escape to freedom, envisioned in this novel as a secret system of actual tracks and tunnels.
books.name: THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Tense turning points for three couples at a backyard barbecue gone wrong.
books.name: TRULY MADLY GUILTY

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: While the president of the United States is in New York to meet with his Russian counterpart, Detective Michael Bennett must stop a team of assassins prowling the Upper West Side.
books.name: BULLSEYE

books.author: by Philippa Gregory
books.description: Henry VIII's two sisters and Katherine of Aragon find themselves pitted against one another.
books.name: THREE SISTERS, THREE QUEENS

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: An English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by J. A. Jance
books.description: An investigator offers help to Sheriff Joanna Brady when her mother and stepfather's R.V. is run off the road.
books.name: RANDOM ACTS

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Kristen Proby
books.description: In this second installment in the Fusion series, a childhood crush becomes adult infatuation for a fighter pilot and a restaurateur.
books.name: CLOSE TO YOU

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: After the death of Will Traynor, Louisa Clark joins a grief support group that may lead her to new love.
books.name: AFTER YOU

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, the Israeli art restorer and spy, trains a doctor from Jerusalem to help capture a secret ISIS terrorist in France.
books.name: THE BLACK WIDOW

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU
